Translations.Text: ‘ami tara ‘ibadata kari na yara ‘ibadata tomara kara
Ebam tomara'o tamra ‘ibadatakari na'o yamra ‘ibadata ami kari
ebam ami ‘ibadatakari na'i tara yara ‘ibadata tomara kare asacha
Ebam tomara'o tamra ‘ibadatakari habe na yamra ‘ibadata ami kari
tomadera dina tomadera, ara amara dbina amara [1].’
